resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103879</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103879</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">United We Stand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinigt Stehen Wir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Uni Nous Nous tenons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido Nós Estamos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito Ci leviamo in piedi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενωμένοι στεκόμαστε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unido Estamos parados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides primary source documents that students use to examine the working conditions of U.S. laborers at the turn of the century and to develop their own answers to a question: Was there a need for organized labor unions?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Primärquelldokumente zur Verfügung, denen
Kursteilnehmer, die Arbeitsbedingungen der VEREINIGTE STAATEN Arbeiter
an der Jahrhundertwende zu überprüfen pflegen und ihre eigenen 
Antworten zu einer Frage zu entwickeln: Gab es eine 
Notwendigkeit an organisierten Arbeiterverbänden?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit les documents de source primaires que les 
étudiants utilisent pour examiner les conditions de travail des 
travailleurs des ETATS-UNIS à la fin du siècle et pour développer 
leurs propres réponses à une question : Y avait-il un besoin 
de syndicats de travail organisés ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece os originais de fonte preliminares que os 
estudantes se usam examinar as condições de funcionamento de 
laborers de ESTADOS UNIDOS na volta do século e desenvolver suas 
próprias respostas a uma pergunta: Havia uma necessidade para 
uniões labor organizadas?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce i documenti di origine primari che gli 
allievi usano esaminare le condizioni di lavoro dei lavoratori degli 
STATI UNITI alla fine del secolo e sviluppare le loro proprie risposte
ad una domanda: Era ci un'esigenza dei sindacati di lavoro 
organizzati?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τα αρχικά έγγραφα πηγής που οι σπουδαστές 
χρησιμοποιούν για να εξετάσουν τις συνθήκες εργασίας των 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΩΝ laborers στο γύρισμα του αιώνα και για να 
αναπτύξουν τις απαντήσεις τους σε μια ερώτηση: Υπήρξε μια 
ανάγκη για τα οργανωμένα εργατικά συνδικάτα;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a los documentos de fuente primarios 
que los estudiantes utilizan examinar las condiciones de trabajo de 
los trabajadores de ESTADOS UNIDOS al final del siglo y desarrollar 
sus propias respuestas a una pregunta: ¿Había una necesidad de 
sindicatos ordenados?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103879</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/united-we-stand</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
